apps/backend/runners/github/services/aut.description: autofix_processor.py connects AutoPRReviewOrchestrator to QA pass workflow. Entry point is trigger_auto_pr_review_on_qa_pass() which initiates the review loop after QA passes. Supports both async and sync invocation patterns. Configuration via GITHUB_AUTO_PR_REVIEW_ENABLED env var.

apps/backend/runners/github/models/telem.description: PRReviewLoopTelemetry dataclass for iteration metrics collection. Provides CheckMetrics, FixMetrics, IterationMetrics classes for granular tracking. Supports file-based persistence to .auto-claude/github/telemetry/pr_{number}.json with save/load methods. Use start_iteration(), record_check_metrics(), record_fix_metrics(), complete_iteration() for workflow tracking.
